Author: danithegreatish
Text: it's a primal panic response based on your brains reaction to not being fed when it expects to be. you're not even actually hungry, your brain is just screaming at you to eat because it thinks something is wrong. the brain wants to keep you in a state of comfort and homeostasis, and any change in pattern or discomfort will cause it to freak out. you don't actually need to eat, if it's only been 22 hours. you can try to fool your brain by chewing sugar free gum (brain tastes sweet + feels chewing) or drinking diet Coke or black coffee (caffeine is an appetite suppressant + the liquid will fill you up).
